how_to_play_section_1_step_a: a. Access the Howard Trivia Application
how_to_play_section_1_step_a_desc: Open your preferred web browser and navigate to the Howard Trivia URL.
how_to_play_section_1_step_b_desc: You can sign in using your Email and Password or opt for Google Sign-In for quicker authentication.
how_to_play_section_1_step_c_desc: Enter your credentials and click 'Login' or 'Sign Up' to access your account. If you encounter any issues, refer to the error messages displayed for guidance.
how_to_play_section_1_step_d_desc: Upon successful login, you will be redirected to your personalized dashboard, where you can access all features of Howard Trivia.
how_to_play_section_2_step_a_desc: From your dashboard, click on the 'Create Challenge' button to begin crafting your own Howard University-related challenge.
how_to_play_section_2_step_b_desc: Provide a compelling title and a detailed description for your challenge. Ensure that your questions are clear, accurate, and relevant to Howard University.
how_to_play_section_2_step_c_desc: For each challenge, add a series of multiple-choice questions. Each question should have at least two options, with one marked as the correct answer. Optionally, you can include a hint to assist players after incorrect attempts.
how_to_play_section_2_step_d_desc: Once all details are filled out, review your challenge for accuracy and completeness. Click 'Publish' to make your challenge available to other users. **Note:** Your score will not be counted if you play the challenge you created.
how_to_play_section_3_step_a_desc: On your dashboard, explore the list of available Howard Trivia challenges. You can use the search bar to find specific challenges or filter them based on categories.
how_to_play_section_3_step_b: b. Select a Challenge to Play
how_to_play_section_3_step_b_desc: Click on the 'Play Challenge' button next to your chosen challenge to start playing. **Important:** Your score will not be counted if you play the same challenge more than once.
how_to_play_section_3_step_c_desc: Respond to each multiple-choice question. You have two attempts to answer each question correctly.
how_to_play_section_3_step_d_desc: After two incorrect attempts on a question, a hint will be provided to help you deduce the correct answer.
how_to_play_section_3_step_e_desc: Upon answering all questions, your total score will be calculated based on correct answers. If it's your first time playing this challenge, your score will be added to the leaderboard.
how_to_play_section_3_step_f_desc: After completing the challenge, review your answers and scores. Reflect on areas of strength and opportunities for improvement.
how_to_play_section_4_step_a_desc: Each correct answer awards you 10 points. The total score for a challenge is the sum of points from all correct answers.
how_to_play_section_4_step_b_desc: Your cumulative scores from all challenges are displayed on the leaderboard. Strive to climb the rankings by participating in more challenges and improving your scores. The user with the highest score will receive exclusive Howard University merchandise!
how_to_play_section_4_step_c_desc:
To maintain fairness:

how_to_play_section_5_step_a_desc: Read each question carefully to increase your chances of selecting the correct answer.
how_to_play_section_5_step_b_desc: Hints are available after two incorrect attempts. Use them strategically to maximize your score.
how_to_play_section_5_step_c_desc: Engage in multiple challenges regularly to improve your knowledge about Howard University and climb the leaderboard.
how_to_play_section_5_step_d_desc: If you're creating challenges, ensure your questions are clear, varied, and provide a good balance of difficulty to engage players effectively.
how_to_play_section_5_step_e_desc: After completing a challenge, review your answers to understand areas for improvement.
